select * from (select zzz.*, rownum RNUM from ( select rownum "rank", srch_kwd "srch_kwd", kwd_cnt "kwd_cnt" from ( select srch_key "SRCH_KWD", count(*) "KWD_CNT" from keyword group by srch_key order by 2 desc ) where 1=1
) zzz)
select count(*) "kwd_cnt", to_char(srch_dt, 'yy.mm.dd') "date" from keyword where srch_dt >= to_date('20190101', 'yyyymmdd') group by to_char(srch_dt, 'yy.mm.dd') order by 2
select rownum "rank", srch_kwd "srch_kwd", kwd_cnt "kwd_cnt" from ( select srch_key "SRCH_KWD", count(*) "KWD_CNT" from keyword group by srch_key order by 2 desc ) where 1=1

select (extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd "dt", (select count(*) from book b where to_char(b.reg_dt, 'yyyymm')= (extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd) "cnt" from code_month c order by c.month_cd

select (extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd "dt", (select count(*) from book b where to_char(b.reg_dt, 'yyyymm')= (extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd and b.cat_cd=#{cat_cd}) "cnt" from code_month c order by c.month_cd
select (select c.jikup from code_jikup c where c.jikup_cd = e.jikup_cd) "jikup", nvl(count(*), 0) "cnt" from employee e where e.EMP_RESIGN_DATE is null group by e.jikup_cd order by e.jikup_cd

select (extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd "dt", (select count(*) from employee e) "tot_cnt", nvl( (select count(*) from employee e where to_char(e.hire_dt, 'yyyymm')=(extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd), 0) "hire_cnt", nvl( (select count(*) from employee e where to_char(e.emp_resign_date, 'yyyymm')=(extract(year from sysdate)-1)||c.month_cd), 0) "resign_cnt" from code_month c

select (select cc.cat_name from code_category cc where cc.cat_cd=c.cat_cd) "cat_name", nvl((select count(*) from book b where b.cat_cd=c.cat_cd), 0) "cnt" from code_category c, book b where b.cat_cd = c.cat_cd(+) group by c.cat_cd(+) order by c.cat_cd
